p: We obtained daily time series of mean temperature and total precipitation data from five manned weather stations 14–410 km apart (Figure 1). Data from Barentsburg were downloaded from Tutiempo Network, S.L. ( https://en.tutiempo.net/climate/ws-201070.html), while data from Hornsund were provided by the Institute of Geophysics of the Polish Academy of Sciences. For the three remaining weather stations (i.e. Svalbard Airport, Ny‐Ålesund and Hopen), we downloaded data from the Norwegian Meteorological Institute ( http://eklima.met.no).
